predicate.note: Frames file for 'soak' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entries fill-9.8, wipe_manner-10.4.1, other_caus-45.4. Other framed members include spot, surround, trim; scour, squeeze; and a whole bunch of others. No explicit comparison.

roleset.name: cause to become very very wet

example.name: transitive
example.text: A 10-gallon water cooler had toppled onto the floor, *trace* soaking the red carpeting.

example.name: prepositional thing getting wet
example.text: The spilled milk slowly soaked into John's homework.

example.name: no instrument
example.text: But the recent volatility in stock prices caused by the program trading has made some market makers less willing *trace* to soak up the stocks that are for sale.
example.arg: the stocks that are for sale

example.name: with instrument
example.text: John soaked up the spilled milk with his linguistics homework.
